entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [ppc64le][mono] dotnet tool update -g is failing #41672
  • SDK and runtime compatibility #41893
  • [Bug] Failed to download Cpp2IL #42003
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #41938
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42092
  • Allow dotnet nuget why command to take the project in the current folder as its input #42123
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21456.8]The output content is empty when starting the global tool application dotnet-format #20694
  • Using SDK compiler in torn builds #41791
    9.0.1xx

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'alpine.3.19-x64' is not recognized. #39733
  • dotnet new command, for project templates, behaves differently between macOS and Linux (Ubuntu) #41644
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
  • Failed to sign apphost error code 1 #41636
    Discussion
  • apicompat --package-assembly-references is difficult to use #41686
  • Enable bundling NativeAOT NuGet packages from runtime on non-vmr builds. #41687
  • Upgrading "aspire" workload causes builds to fail until Visual Studio is restarted #41862
    Backlog
  • Installing DotNet CLI via winget not working - Dotnet CLI missing #41878
    Discussion
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844
  • Installer kills software without asking #41815
  • EnableDynamicLoading causes multiple loading of assemblies at runtime #41805
  • Potential telemetry cleanup logic error - unsent telemetry events buildup #41796
  • Permission Denied or Access Denied when running a global dotnet tool #41947
  • dotnet tool install doesn't respect packageSourceMapping #41871
  • dotnet build leaves lingering dotnet processes on raspberry pi (debian) #41870
  • System.AccessViolationException in build process #41868
  • WindowsBase version conflict between Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App and Microsoft.NETCore.App #41909
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012
  • Checksum links in https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/blob/main/documentation/package-table.md#table fail #42008
  • dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0.7 missing in Fedora 40 & RHEL repo #42063
  • Setting <IsPublishable>false</IsPublishable> should force PublishIISAssets to false. #42048
  • MSBuild SDK support for C++/CLI #42078
    Discussion
  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • dotnet sln add: doesn't add MAUI project for Deploy #42108
  • dotnet clean and build [or dotnet rebuild] as one command #42096
  • AzureDevops pipeline issue when trying to install .NET 8 Sdk #42093
  • Move 8.0.4xx to internal #42055
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite how to prevent all the runtime binaries from being emitted? #37147
  • -warnnotaserror does not work for warning NU1605 #37972
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.1xx
  • Can not install dotnet-ef through CLI (Unauthorized) #11837
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hh2w-p6rv-4g7w" displays after building mstest project in CLI. #42091
  • How can you test multiple netstandard targets? #1561
    Discussion
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506

PullRequests

Created

  • Let deployment-tools use the VMR commit hash #42139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fix scoped CSS hot reload #42137
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CodeOwners file #42127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix TestPackage paths #42136
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • stabilize branding for release #42053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix test for Multi-Target workloads #42062
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.4xx #40209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.3xx #40216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.1xx #40211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CentOS tags in 6.0.1xx #40210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Update to the 8.0.7 July release #42054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Alma Linux SB CI leg to validate min glibc support #42106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a top-level --with-system-libs arg to build.sh #42120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42121
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2493822 #42118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB CI to alpine 3.20 #42119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to MAUI .NET 9 Preview 6 manifests #42077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
